item.title: 美联储的沃勒稳定币可为金融体系带来好处
item.description: 美联储理事克里斯托弗-沃勒（Christopher Waller）周二表示，稳定币实际上是 "合成 "美元，可以为金融系统带来好处。【原文：Federal Reserve Governor Christopher Waller said Tuesday stablecoins are effectively “synthetic” dollars that can bring benefits to the financial system.】

item.title: 独家消息：消息称德国商业银行考虑在联合信贷银行防御计划中收购国内竞争对手
item.description: 三位知情人士告诉路透社，德国商业银行正在权衡收购一家德国中型银行，作为其抵御意大利联合信贷银行（UniCredit）可能收购的战略的一部分。【原文：Commerzbank is weighing the acquisition of a mid-sized German bank as part of its strategy to fend off a possible takeover by Italy's UniCredit , three people with knowledge of the matter told Reuters.】

item.title: 美联储的沃勒私营部门应引领支付系统创新
item.description: 美联储理事克里斯托弗-沃勒（Christopher Waller）周二表示，他认为私营部门应在支付领域的创新方面发挥主导作用。【原文：Federal Reserve Governor Christopher Waller said on Tuesday that he believes the private sector should lead when it comes to payment sector innovations.】

item.title: 巴金表示，美联储 "有能力 "在必要时应对风险
item.description: 里士满联储主席托马斯-巴尔金（Thomas Barkin）周二表示，随着通胀率接近美联储2%的目标，劳动力市场富有弹性，美国央行正在降低借贷成本，如果通胀压力上升或就业市场疲软，决策者已做好应对准备。【原文：With inflation close to the Federal Reserve's 2% target, the labor market resilient, and the U.S. central bank in the process of lowering borrowing costs, policymakers are ready to respond if inflation pressures rise or the job market weakens, Richmond Fed President Thomas Barkin said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 阿根廷通胀率有所下降，但消费者仍感觉受到挤压
item.description: 阿根廷总统哈维尔-米莱伊（Javier Milei）大刀阔斧的紧缩政策帮助降低了通货膨胀，但经济增长放缓是以消费为代价的。【原文：Argentine President Javier Milei's dramatic austerity agenda has helped lower inflation, but the slowdown has come at the cost of consumption in a battered economy where more than half of the country has fallen into poverty.】

item.title: 卡夫-海因茨从美国免费和低价学校午餐计划中撤下主要的 Lunchables 餐点
item.description: 卡夫亨氏公司在一份声明中称，该公司将不再为接受联邦计划提供的免费或减价膳食的低收入学生生产其包装午餐品牌 Lunchables，这是对该公司最具标志性产品之一的最新打击。【原文：Kraft Heinz is no longer making its packaged lunch brand Lunchables for low-income students receiving free and reduced-priced meals from a federal program, according to a company statement, the latest blow to one of the company's most iconic products.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称辉瑞正在探索出售医院用药部门
item.description: 据三位熟悉内情的人士透露，辉瑞公司正在探索出售其医院用药部门，因为这家制药商一直受到激进投资者 Starboard Value 的压力，希望剥离非核心资产。【原文：Pfizer is exploring the sale of its hospital drugs unit, as the drugmaker, which has been under pressure from activist investor Starboard Value, looks to divest non-core assets, according to three people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 美国最高法院不会审理纽约租金稳定法冲突案
item.description: 美国最高法院周二拒绝审理业主团体挑战纽约市租金稳定法的诉讼，该法规定了租金上涨的上限，并增加了驱逐租户的难度。【原文：The U.S. Supreme Court declined on Tuesday to hear a bid by landlord groups to challenge rent stabilization laws in New York City that cap rent hikes and make it harder to evict tenants.】

item.title: 精神公司将从波音公司获得高达 3.5 亿美元的预付款
item.description: 精神航空系统公司（Spirit AeroSystems）周二表示，波音公司将向该公司支付总额高达 3.5 亿美元的预付款，这为这家陷入困境的供应商提供了一条救命稻草，因为该公司在连续四年亏损后仍在继续烧钱。【原文：Spirit AeroSystems said on Tuesday that Boeing will pay a total of up to $350 million in advance payments to the firm, providing the struggling supplier a lifeline as it continues to burn cash after four consecutive years of losses.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，美国司法部准备就 UnitedHealth-Amedisys 交易提起诉讼
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周二援引知情人士的话报道，美国司法部正着手阻止联合健康集团（UnitedHealth Group）斥资 33 亿美元收购 Amedisys 公司（Amedisys Inc.【原文：The U.S. Justice Department is moving to block UnitedHealth Group's $3.3 billion purchase of Amedisys Inc. over concerns the deal would harm competition in the market for home health services, Bloomberg News reported on Tuesday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 亚马逊为人工智能研究人员提供免费计算能力，旨在挑战英伟达
item.description: 亚马逊公司（Amazon.com）云计算部门周二表示，将向希望使用其定制人工智能芯片的研究人员提供免费计算能力，旨在挑战英伟达（Nvidia）在这些研究人员中的受欢迎程度。【原文：Amazon.com's cloud computing unit on Tuesday said it will offer free computing power to researchers who want to use its custom artificial intelligence chips, aiming to challenge Nvidia's popularity among those researchers.】

item.title: Netflix 的广告支持层用户达到 7000 万
item.description: Netflix 周二表示，其广告支持层目前在全球拥有 7000 万月活跃用户，比今年早些时候报告的数字几乎翻了一番。【原文：Netflix said on Tuesday that its ad-supported tier now has 70 million monthly active users globally, nearly doubling the number reported earlier this year.】

item.title: Meta 将在欧洲提供个性化程度更低的广告，以安抚监管机构
item.description: 科技巨头 Meta Platforms 周二宣布，计划为欧洲的 Instagram 和 Facebook 用户提供接收 "个性化程度较低的广告 "的选择，以消除监管机构日益增长的担忧。【原文：Meta Platforms plans to offer Instagram and Facebook users in Europe the option to receive "less personalized ads," the tech giant announced on Tuesday, in an effort to allay regulators' mounting concerns.】

item.title: 赫兹季度业绩不及预期，股价下跌
item.description: 赫兹全球（Hertz Global）周二公布的第三季度财报显示，受车队车辆折旧费用影响，该公司第三季度亏损幅度超过预期，营收不及预期，导致其股价在盘前交易中下跌超过 8%。【原文：Hertz Global reported a wider-than-expected third-quarter loss and missed revenue estimates on Tuesday, hurt by depreciation charges from its fleet vehicles, sending shares of the rental car firm down more than 8% in premarket trading.】

item.title: 加拿大劳工部长将介绍港口争端的最新情况
item.description: 加拿大劳工部长史蒂文-麦金农（Steven MacKinnon）办公室在一份声明中说，加拿大劳工部长史蒂文-麦金农将于东部时间周二上午 10 点（格林尼治标准时间 15 点）向媒体介绍温哥华和蒙特利尔主要港口的纠纷情况。【原文：Canadian Labour Minister Steven MacKinnon will brief media at 10 am Eastern Time (1500 GMT) on Tuesday about the status of disputes at the major ports of Vancouver and Montreal, his office said in a statement.】

item.title: 由于 COVID 疫苗销量下降，诺维信再次下调 2024 年收入预期
item.description: 在将 COVID-19 疫苗的销售权移交给赛诺菲公司之前，Novavax 公司周二下调了年度收入预期，理由是其 COVID-19 疫苗的销售额低于预期。【原文：Novavax cut its annual revenue forecast on Tuesday, citing lower-than-expected sales of its COVID-19 vaccine, ahead of handing over the rights to sell the shot to Sanofi .】

item.title: 巴西九月份零售额增幅低于预期
item.description: 巴西 9 月份的零售额增幅低于预期，但已从上个月的下降中恢复，在央行打击通胀的背景下，拉美最大经济体的实力仍是关注的焦点。【原文：Retail sales in Brazil rose less than expected in September but recovered from a fall in the previous month, as the strength of Latin America's largest economy keeps in focus amidst the central bank's fight against inflation.】

item.title: 马斯克的 Starlink 公司正在为卫星宽带申请印度安全许可
item.description: 印度电信部长周二表示，埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的 Starlink 公司正在寻求获得在印度提供卫星宽带服务的安全许可，如果满足所有条件，该公司将获得许可。【原文：Elon Musk's Starlink is seeking security clearance for a licence to offer satellite broadband services in India and will get a permit if it satisfies all conditions, the telecoms minister said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 泰森食品公司因猪肉价格下跌、鸡肉需求放缓而预测全年收入下滑
item.description: 受鸡肉需求放缓和猪肉价格下跌的影响，泰森食品公司周二预计全年收入低于华尔街预期。【原文：Tyson Foods forecast full-year revenue below Wall Street expectations on Tuesday, pressured by slowing chicken demand and lower pork prices.】

item.title: 杰尼亚控股家族股东增持集团股份
item.description: 杰尼亚（Ermenegildo Zegna）公司周二表示，该公司的控股股东已增持了该奢侈品集团的股份，并打算进一步增持。【原文：Ermenegildo Zegna's controlling shareholder has raised its stake in the luxury group and intends to increase it further, the company said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 受金属价格拖累，多伦多证券交易所期货下滑
item.description: 由于金属价格下跌的影响，与加拿大主要股指挂钩的期货周二下跌，而投资者则关注当天将公布的主要国内财报和本周晚些时候的美国通胀数据。【原文：Futures tied to Canada's main stock index fell on Tuesday, as lower metal prices weighed, while investors focused on major domestic earnings due on the day and U.S. inflation data later in the week.】

item.title: 人工智能吸引顾客，Shopify 发布乐观假期预测，股价大涨
item.description: 本周二，Shopify 预测第四季度营收增长将超过预期，因为这家加拿大公司专注于采用人工智能驱动的工具，在最重要的假日季节到来之前吸引更多商家使用其电子商务服务。【原文：Shopify forecast fourth-quarter revenue growth above estimates on Tuesday, as the Canadian company's focus on employing AI-powered tools attract more merchants to its e-commerce services ahead of the all-important holiday season.】

item.title: 焦点从大选转向经济数据，期指回调
item.description: 在华尔街过去几天因大选结果而反弹之后，美国股指期货周二下跌，因为交易商在等待本周晚些时候的关键通胀数据，以获得更多有关美国经济和货币政策前景的信号。【原文：U.S. stock index futures dipped on Tuesday after Wall Street's rally over the past few days following election results as traders awaited key inflation data later in the week for more signals on the country's economic and monetary policy outlook.】

item.title: 欧盟呼吁苹果公司停止在苹果媒体服务上实施地理位置屏蔽行为
item.description: 欧盟委员会周二表示，它正与各国当局一起呼吁苹果公司停止在苹果媒体服务上实施地理封锁。【原文：The European Commission said on Tuesday that along with national authorities it was calling upon Apple to stop geo-blocking practices on Apple Media Services.】

item.title: 顾问称华尔街奖金将自 2021 年以来首次上涨
item.description: 薪酬咨询公司 Johnson Associates 的一份报告显示，华尔街公司今年有望支付更高的奖金，这是自 2021 年丰收年以来的首次增长。【原文：Wall Street firms are expected to pay heftier bonuses for this year, the first increase since a bumper year in 2021, according to a report by compensation consultancy Johnson Associates.】

item.title: 家得宝上调年度同店销售预期
item.description: 家得宝（Home Depot）周二上调了年度同店销售预期，押注专业承包商的需求将有所恢复，以抵消厨房装修等大型项目的支出疲软。【原文：Home Depot raised its annual same-store sales forecast on Tuesday, betting on resilient demand from professional contractors to offset weak spending on bigger projects such as kitchen renovations.】

item.title: 业界称美国对加拿大石油的依赖应阻止特朗普征收关税
item.description: 加拿大能源行业预计美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普的广泛贸易保护主义措施计划不会包括对加拿大进口石油征收关税，因为许多美国炼油厂都依赖来自边境北部的石油。【原文：Canada's energy industry does not expect U.S. President-elect Donald Trump's broad plans for protectionist trade measures will include tariffs on Canadian oil imports, because many U.S. refineries rely on barrels from north of the border.】

item.title: 维萨卡与 Affirm 合作在美国推出灵活支付卡
item.description: Visa 正在与金融科技公司 Affirm 合作，在美国推出一种客户既可用于借记交易，也可用于现购现付的银行卡，这反映出客户对支付方式灵活性的需求日益增长。【原文：Visa is partnering with fintech company Affirm to roll out a card in the U.S. that customers can use for both debit transactions and buy now, pay later purchases, reflecting the growing demand for flexibility in payment options.】

item.title: 早间竞价比特币：90,000 美元甚至更高？
item.description: Dhara Ranasinghe 对未来一天美国和全球市场的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Dhara Ranasinghe】

item.title: 马斯克的 "星链 "获得乍得批准，以改善互联网接入
item.description: 乍得周二表示，已批准向埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的卫星互联网服务提供商 Starlink 发放许可证，以改善这个非洲中部国家的互联网服务。【原文：Chad said on Tuesday it had approved the licensing of Elon Musk's satellite internet provider Starlink to improve access to internet services in the central African country.】
